Label: T2 apical hair bands
Help: Complete or interrupted

Label: Texture of integument
Help: Either dulled by surface texture, or smooth and shiny

Label: Pits on center of T2
Help: Absent, or if present, number of pit diameters between pits

Label: Color of dorsal abdomen
Help: Dark, metallic (green or blue), or subtly metallic

Label: Pygidial plate modification
Help: The flattened structure dorsally on T6: plain, or sculptured?

Label: Relative length of F1
Help: Compare length of 1st flagellar segment to second+third

Label: Clypeus shape
Help: Tricky; usuall "normal"

Label: Clypeus appearance
Help: Central basal portion: shiny or textured?

Label: Clypeus midline
Help: Is there a medial  inpunctate band, or ridge?

Label: Fovea color
Help: Decide after playing with angle of view and lighting

Label: Fovea depth
Help: Tricky; deep fovea are easiest to identify

Label: Fovea length
Help: In reference to antennal socket

Label: Fovea distance from ocellus
Help: Number of ocellar diameters between lateral ocellus and fovea

Label: Fovea width
Help: In reference to antennal socket

Label: Head dimensions
Help: Vertical: bottom of clypeus to median ocellus. Horizontal: between eye margins at level of antennal sockets

Label: Labral process length
Help: Compare to labrum length

Label: Labral process margin
Help: Shape of the prominence visible beneath the clypeus

Label: Malar space
Help: Malar space  - between rim of eye and base of mandible

Label: Teeth on mandible apex
Help: Only tridentate for  Daysandrena and Euandrena

Label: Maxilary palp length
Help: Compared to galea

Label: Vertex height
Help: Distance from lateral ocellus to back of head

Label: Midbasitarsus
Help: Compare to hind basitarsus

Label: Modification to hind femur
Help: Specific to Plastandrena

Label: Scopal hair formation
Help: At center of outside face of scopa

Label: Humeral angle
Help: Posterior margin of pronotum

Label: Thorax hair color
Help: Color of hairs, between scutum and bottom of mesepisternum

Label: Pronotal ridge
Help: Pronotal collar, viewed laterally

Label: Corbicula
Help: Incomplete, without anterior fringe of hairs, or complete, anterior hairs present

Label: Propodeal triangle, AKA propodeal enclosure
Help: How much of the area is roughly sculptured?

Label: Submarginal cell number
Help: Typically 3; if 2, this is a valuabvle character

Label: Length of r vein
Help: See images.
